original_text: This is written in the Bible: ‘There is nobody who is right with God. There is not even one person who is like that. This is written in the Bible:
korean_text: 기록된 바 의인은 없나니 하나도 없으며

sentences.original_text: This is written in the Bible:
There is nobody who is right with God.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님과 옳은 관계를 가진 사람은 아무도 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: There is not even one person who is like that.
This is written in the Bible:
